text: The year 2013 was the 4th year in the history of the Road Fighting Championship, an MMA promotion based in South Korea. 2013 started with Road FC 011 and ended with Road FC 013. == List of events == {| class="sortable wikitable succession-box" style="margin:1.0em auto; font-size:80%;" !
